title: Acronis True Image 2014 17.0 Build 6614 Premium
description:
Acronis True Image 2014 by Acronis is a new version of our award winning Home and Home Office PC backup and disaster recovery solution. It provides complete system image backup and recovery of your home PCÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s operating system, applications, settings and personal files. You will able to protect your PC with Acronis True Image 2014 featuring local and available online backup. The software assures that all your important data, including photos, videos, music, documents and applications, are fully protected and can be recovered quickly in the event of any disaster. Use our intuitive graphical user interface to easily define where youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be backing up your PC and how often. Acronis True Image 2014 lets you create copies of your hard drive with just a few quick steps while continuing to work. If you lose an important file or need to recover an earlier version of it, donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t worry: you can go back in time to retrieve it in seconds.

Requirements

Storage Media
Hard Disk Drives
Network Attached Storage (NAS)
FTP Server
CD-R/RW, DVD-R/RW, DVD+R/RW, BD-R
